TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WebProcessInformation extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供有关承载 ASP.NET 的辅助进程的信息。

span.span: Provides information about the worker process that hosts ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 运行状况监视，用于管理已部署的 Web 应用程序的生产和操作人员。ASP.NET health monitoring allows production and operations staff to manage deployed Web applications. 命名空间包含负责打包应用程序运行状况状态数据的运行状况事件类型和提供程序类型负责处理此数据。The namespace contains the health-event types responsible for packaging application health-status data, and the provider types responsible for processing this data. 它还包含在管理运行状况事件期间帮助的支持类型。It also contains supporting types that help during the management of health events. 实例类包含通过任何派生自的类型获取信息类型。Instances of the class contain information that is obtained using any of the types derived from the type. 你的应用程序需要访问受保护的信息，此类型提供的适当权限。Your application needs the appropriate permissions to access protected information provided by this type. 下面的示例摘自配置文件可以使用以启用 ASP.NET 包含进程信息的日志错误事件。The following example is an excerpt of the configuration file you could use to enable ASP.NET to log error events that contain process information. ``` ``` > [!NOTE] > 在大多数情况下，你将是一种能够使用 ASP.NET 运行状况监视类型，因为实现，并且将通过指定中的值控制运行状况监视系统`healthMonitoring`配置节。In most cases you will be able to use the ASP.NET health-monitoring types as implemented, and you will control the health-monitoring system by specifying values in the `healthMonitoring` configuration section. 你还可以从要创建你自己的自定义事件和提供程序的运行状况监视类型派生。You can also derive from the health-monitoring types to create your own custom events and providers. 有关创建自定义的事件类的示例，请参阅示例部分。For an example of creating a custom event class, see the Example section. ## Examples 下面的示例有两个部分。The following example has two parts. 第一种是使 ASP.NET 可以使用自定义事件使用的配置文件的摘录类型。The first is an excerpt of a configuration file that enables ASP.NET to use a custom event that uses the type. 第二部分演示如何实现自定义事件。The second shows how to implement the custom event. 确保你自定义事件是否会引发的在适当的时候，即，当将引发它将替换为等效的系统运行状况事件。Ensure that your custom event is raised at the proper time, that is, when the equivalent system health event it replaces would be raised. ``` ``` 下面的示例演示如何实现使用自定义事件类型。The following example shows how to implement a custom event that uses the type. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebProcessInformation#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebProcessInformation/CS/webprocessinformation.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebProcessInformation#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebProcessInformation/VB/webprocessinformation.vb#1)]

public: property System::String ^ AccountName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取辅助进程的帐户名。

span.span: Gets the account name for the worker process.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你的应用程序需要访问此属性提供的信息的相应权限。Your application needs the appropriate permissions to access the information provided by this property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何获取进程的帐户名称。The following example shows how to obtain the process account name. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebProcessInformation#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebProcessInformation/CS/webprocessinformation.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebProcessInformation#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebProcessInformation/VB/webprocessinformation.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void FormatToString(class System.Web.Management.WebEventFormatter formatter) cil managed

param.name: formatter
param.span: 包含用于设置 Web 运行状况事件信息格式的制表符和缩进设置的 。

span.span: The that contains the tab and indentation settings used to format the Web health event information.

summary.span: 设置应用程序信息的格式。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法为事件的信息，这很有用，如果必须记录事件数据，并将其更高版本提供给用户提供统一的格式。The method provides a uniform format for event information, which is useful if the event data must be logged and later presented to the user. 提供程序调用之一时，内部调用该方法方法。The method is called internally when the provider invokes one of the methods. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置自定义信息的格式。The following example shows how to format custom information.
